result.title: Practical recommendations (Regional level)
result.description: At a Regional level a set of practical recommendations (D6.2.) will be developed with a focus on Regional development strategies and Regional innovation strategies. The recommendations will be targeted to Regional Quintuple Helix stakeholders (policy makers, researchers, industries, citizens and environmental representatives).
